## UrlCopyrightProvider.(constructor)

Default constructor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(m_fetchURL: string, m_baseScheme: string, m_requestHeaders?: RequestHeaders | undefined, m_transferManager?: ITransferManager);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m\_fetchURL | string | URL to fetch copyrights data from. |
|  m\_baseScheme | string | Scheme to get copyrights from. |
|  m\_requestHeaders | RequestHeaders \| undefined | Optional request headers for requests(e.g. Authorization) |
|  m\_transferManager | [ITransferManager](./harp-transfer-manager.itransfermanager.md) |  |
